sentences.en: An east London school has set a precedent by fining pupils who break the rules.
sentences.cn: 伦敦东区的一所学校开创了对违反校规的学生处以罚金的先例。

sentences.en: He erected a new doctrine of precedent.
sentences.cn: 他创立了一套新的判例原则。

sentences.en: However, reviewing courts have refrained from requiring agencies to follow precedent mechanically.
sentences.cn: 然而, 负责审查的法院抑制它们自己不去要求机关机械地遵守先例.

sentences.en: If he is allowed to do this, it will be a precedent for others.
sentences.cn: 如果允许他这样做, 就会为别人开先例.

sentences.en: Is there a precedent for what you want me to do?
sentences.cn: 你要我做的事有前例可援 吗 ?

sentences.en: Legal experts said her case would not set a precedent because it was an out-of-court settlement.
sentences.cn: 法律专家说她的案子不会成为判例，因为它是庭外和解的。

sentences.en: Management, unlike law, is not a science based on precedent.
sentences.cn: 管理学不同于法学, 不是一门以前例为依据的科学.

sentences.en: The Obama administration and police officers around the country say no, and their precedent is the past.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马政府和全国各地的警官说不可以，他们引为依据的先例就是“过去”。

sentences.en: The ruling set a precedent for future libel cases.
sentences.cn: 这项裁决为今后的诽谤案提供了判例。

sentences.en: The trial could set an important precedent for dealing with similar cases.
sentences.cn: 这次审判能为处理类似案件开创一个重要先例。

sentences.en: There is no historical precedent that can tell us what happens to established democracies when most citizens go years, even decades, without an improvement in their standard of living.
sentences.cn: 没有历史先例能告诉我们，当大多数人民的生活水平在几年、甚至几十年间维持不变时，一个已经确立根基的民主国家会发生什么。

sentences.en: There is not only logic to this argument but precedent, too.
sentences.cn: 这不仅在逻辑上有过争议, 而且也有过先例.

sentences.en: They were determined to break from precedent.
They're keenly aware that whatever they decide will set a precedent.
sentences.cn: 他们深知无论他们的决定是什么，都将开创先例。

sentences.en: This decision sets a precedent for future cases of a similar nature.
sentences.cn: 这一裁决为今后性质类似的案件提供了判例.

sentences.en: Would it not set a precedent? Would it not open the floodgates?
sentences.cn: 难道它不会成为先例吗？难道它不会引发更多类似的问题吗？

trans.tran_en: an action or official decision that can be used to give support to later actions or decisions
